description: Simple insertion of Symcon configuration form elements (form.json) via the sidebar.
config.emptyValuesDesc: If activated, fields with empty values are also transferred to the form.
config.deleteDefaultsDesc: If activated, fields with default values are not transferred to the form.
config.defaultWidthDesc: If not empty, the default width is overwritten with the stored value (px or %).
config.alwaysIncludesDesc: List of parameter keys that should always be written, even if empty or default (comma-separated).
